Up to 25kg      |    40
Up to 50kg      |    60
Up to 100kg     |    80
Up to 200kg     |   100
Above 200kg     |   120

chatter.name: Chatter
chatter.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has either a 1%, 11%, or 31% chance to confuse the target, based on the volume of the recording made for this move; louder recordings increase the chance of confusion.  If the user is not a chatot, this move will not cause confusion.

This move cannot be copied by mimic, mirror move, or sketch, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.

judgment.name: Judgment
judgment.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move's type is the type corresponding to that item.

Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.

bug-bite.name: Bug Bite
bug-bite.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately.

If the target is holding a jaboca berry or rowap berry, the berry is still removed, but has no effect.

If this move is super effective and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move's damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.

charge-beam.name: Charge Beam
charge-beam.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.

wood-hammer.name: Wood Hammer
wood-hammer.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

attack-order.name: Attack Order
attack-order.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.

defend-order.name: Defend Order
defend-order.effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.

heal-order.name: Heal Order
heal-order.effect: Heals the user for half its max HP.

head-smash.name: Head Smash
head-smash.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/2 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

double-hit.name: Double Hit
double-hit.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.

roar-of-time.name: Roar of Time
roar-of-time.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

spacial-rend.name: Spacial Rend
spacial-rend.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.

lunar-dance.name: Lunar Dance
lunar-dance.effect: User faints.  Its replacement's HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.

crush-grip.name: Crush Grip
crush-grip.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power directly relates to the target's relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.

magma-storm.name: Magma Storm
magma-storm.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.

seed-flare.name: Seed Flare
seed-flare.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by two stages.

ominous-wind.name: Ominous Wind
ominous-wind.effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise all of the user's stats one stage.

shadow-force.name: Shadow Force
shadow-force.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User vanishes for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

This move ignores the effects of detect and protect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

hone-claws.name: Hone Claws
hone-claws.effect: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by one stage.

wide-guard.name: Wide Guard
wide-guard.effect:
Moves with multiple targets will not hit friendly Pokémon for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

guard-split.name: Guard Split
guard-split.effect: Averages the user's unmodified Defense with the target's unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.

power-split.name: Power Split
power-split.effect:
Averages the user's unmodified Attack with the target's unmodified Attack; the value becomes the unmodified Attack for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Attack is averaged the same way.

This effect applies before any other persistent changes to unmodified Attack or Special Attack, such as flower gift during sunny day.

wonder-room.name: Wonder Room
wonder-room.effect: For five turns (including this one), every Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense are swapped.

psyshock.name: Psyshock
psyshock.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation always uses the target's Defense, regardless of this move's damage class.

venoshock.name: Venoshock
venoshock.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is poisoned, this move has double power.

autotomize.name: Autotomize
autotomize.effect: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.  Halves the user's weight; this effect does not stack.

rage-powder.name: Rage Powder
rage-powder.effect:
Until the end of this turn, any moves that opposing Pokémon target solely at the user's ally will instead target the user.  If both Pokémon on the same side of the field use this move on the same turn, the Pokémon that uses it last will become the target.

This effect takes priority over lightning rod and storm drain.

If the user's ally switches out, opposing Pokémon may still hit it with pursuit.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
telekinesis.effect:
For three turns (including this one), moves used against the target have 100% accuracy, but the target is immune to ground damage.  Accuracy of one-hit KO moves is exempt from this effect.

This effect is removed by gravity.  If Gravity is already in effect, this move will fail.

magic-room.name: Magic Room
magic-room.effect: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.

smack-down.name: Smack Down
smack-down.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Removes the target's immunity to ground-type damage.  This effect removes any existing Ground immunity due to levitate, magnet rise, or telekinesis, and causes the target's flying type to be ignored when it takes Ground damage.

If the target isn't immune to Ground damage, this move will fail.

This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, and ends the effect of Bounce or Fly.

storm-throw.name: Storm Throw
storm-throw.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Always scores a critical hit.

flame-burst.name: Flame Burst
flame-burst.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.

sludge-wave.name: Sludge Wave
sludge-wave.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target.

quiver-dance.name: Quiver Dance
quiver-dance.effect: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

heavy-slam.name: Heavy Slam
heavy-slam.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user's weight compared to the target's, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 120.

User's weight                    | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target's weight     |    40
Up to 3× the target's weight     |    60
Up to 4× the target's weight     |    80
Up to 5× the target's weight     |   100
More than 5× the target's weight |   120

synchronoise.name: Synchronoise
synchronoise.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.

electro-ball.name: Electro Ball
electro-ball.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user's Speed compared to the target's, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 150.

User's Speed                     | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target's Speed      |    60
Up to 3× the target's Speed      |    80
Up to 4× the target's Speed      |   120
More than 4× the target's Speed  |   150

soak.name: Soak
soak.effect: Changes the target to pure water-type until it leaves the field.  If the target has multitype, this move will fail.

flame-charge.name: Flame Charge
flame-charge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage.

coil.name: Coil
coil.effect: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.

low-sweep.name: Low Sweep
low-sweep.effect: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.

acid-spray.name: Acid Spray
acid-spray.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.

foul-play.name: Foul Play
foul-play.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage is calculated using the target's attacking stat rather than the user's.

simple-beam.name: Simple Beam
simple-beam.effect: Changes the target's ability to simple.

entrainment.name: Entrainment
entrainment.effect: Changes the target's ability to match the user's.  This effect ends when the target leaves battle.

after-you.name: After You
after-you.effect:
The target will act next this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority.
If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.

round.name: Round
round.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If round has already been used this turn, this move's power is doubled.  After this move is used, any other Pokémon using it this turn will immediately do so (in the order they would otherwise act), regardless of Speed or priority.  Pokémon using other moves will then continue to act as usual.

echoed-voice.name: Echoed Voice
echoed-voice.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use's power is added to this move's power, to a maximum of 200.

chip-away.name: Chip Away
chip-away.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation ignores the target's stat modifiers, including evasion.

clear-smog.name: Clear Smog
clear-smog.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  All of the target's stat modifiers are reset to zero.

stored-power.name: Stored Power
stored-power.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power is increased by 100% its original value for every stage any of the user's stats have been raised.  Accuracy, evasion, and lowered stats do not affect this move's power.  For a Pokémon with all five stats modified to +6, this move's power is 31×.

quick-guard.name: Quick Guard
quick-guard.effect:
Moves with priority greater than 0 will not hit friendly Pokémon for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

ally-switch.name: Ally Switch
ally-switch.effect: User switches position on the field with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.  If the user is in the middle position in a triple battle, or there are no other friendly Pokémon, this move will fail.

scald.name: Scald
scald.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.

shell-smash.name: Shell Smash
shell-smash.effect: Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages each.  Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.

heal-pulse.name: Heal Pulse
heal-pulse.effect: Heals the target for half its max HP.

hex.name: Hex
hex.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has a major status ailment, this move has double power.

sky-drop.name: Sky Drop
sky-drop.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User carries the target high into the air for one turn, during which no moves will hit either Pokémon and neither can act.  On the following turn, the user drops the target, inflicting damage and ending the effect.

If the target is flying-type, this move will function as normal but inflict no damage.

gust, hurricane, sky uppercut, smack down, thunder, twister, and whirlwind can hit both the user and the target during this effect.  gust and twister will additionally have double power.

The damage from hail and sandstorm still applies during this effect.

Either Pokémon may be hit during this effect if also under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

*Bug*: If gravity is used during a double or triple battle while this move is in effect, this move is not correctly canceled on the target, and it remains high in the air indefinitely.  As this move prevents the target from acting, the only way to subsequently remove it from the field is to faint it.

shift-gear.name: Shift Gear
shift-gear.effect: Raises the user's Attack by one stage and its Speed by two stages.

circle-throw.name: Circle Throw
circle-throw.effect:
Inflicts regular damage, then switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon, selected at random.

If the target is under the effect of ingrain or suction cups, or it has a substitute, or its Trainer has no more usable Pokémon, it will not be switched out.  If the target is a wild Pokémon, the battle ends instead.

incinerate.name: Incinerate
incinerate.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, it's destroyed and cannot be used in response to this move.

quash.name: Quash
quash.effect: Forces the target to act last this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority.  If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.

acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
acrobatics.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the user has no held item, this move has double power.

reflect-type.name: Reflect Type
reflect-type.effect: User's type changes to match the target's.

retaliate.name: Retaliate
retaliate.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon fainted on the previous turn, this move has double power.

final-gambit.name: Final Gambit
final-gambit.effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP.  User faints.

bestow.name: Bestow
bestow.effect: Transfers the user's held item to the target.  If the user has no held item, or the target already has a held item, this move will fail.

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.

water-pledge.name: Water Pledge
water-pledge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used grass pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon have halved Speed for four turns (including this one).

fire-pledge.name: Fire Pledge
fire-pledge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).

grass-pledge.name: Grass Pledge
grass-pledge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used fire pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon will take 1/8 their max HP in damage at the end of every turn for four turns (including this one).

volt-switch.name: Volt Switch
volt-switch.effect:
Inflicts regular damage, then the user immediately switches out, and the trainer selects a replacement Pokémon from the party.  If the target faints from this attack, the user's trainer selects the new Pokémon to send out first.  If the user is the last Pokémon in its party that can battle, it will not switch out.

The user may be hit by pursuit when it switches out, if it has been targeted and pursuit has not yet been used.

This move may be used even if the user is under the effect of ingrain.  ingrain's effect will end.

-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target's weight     |    40
Up to 3× the target's weight     |    60
Up to 4× the target's weight     |    80
Up to 5× the target's weight     |   100
More than 5× the target's weight |   120

For all other purposes, this move is pure Fighting-type.  If this move's type is changed, its Fighting typing is overwritten, and its secondary type remains Flying.

If the target has used minimize since entering battle, this move has double power and will never miss.

mat-block.name: Mat Block
mat-block.effect: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves.  Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.

After the user eats a berry, it may use this move any number of times until the end of the battle, even if it switches out.  Eating a held berry, eating a berry via bug bite or pluck, or being the target of a Flung berry will enable this move.  Feeding a Pokémon a berry from the bag or using natural gift will not.

If the trainer chooses this move when it cannot be used, the choice is rejected outright and the trainer must choose another move.

sticky-web.name: Sticky Web

Pokémon in the air, such as flying-types and those with levitate, are unaffected.  rapid spin removes Sticky Web from the user's side of the field; defog removes it from both sides.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

sappy-seed.effect: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets leech seed on the target.

freezy-frost.name: Freezy Frost
freezy-frost.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  All of the target's stat modifiers are reset to zero.

sparkly-swirl.name: Sparkly Swirl
sparkly-swirl.effect: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) removes major status effects from every Pokémon in the user's party.

veevee-volley.name: Veevee Volley
veevee-volley.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with happiness, given by `happiness * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102.  Power bottoms out at 1.

double-iron-bash.name: Double Iron Bash
double-iron-bash.effect: with a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.

shadow-rush.name: Shadow Rush
shadow-rush.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move while in hyper mode.

shadow-blast.name: Shadow Blast
shadow-blast.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.

shadow-bolt.name: Shadow Bolt
shadow-bolt.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.

shadow-chill.name: Shadow Chill
shadow-chill.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target.

shadow-end.name: Shadow End
shadow-end.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/2 of its current HP in recoil.

shadow-fire.name: Shadow Fire
shadow-fire.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.

shadow-down.name: Shadow Down
shadow-down.effect: Lowers the target's Defense by two stages.

shadow-half.name: Shadow Half
shadow-half.effect: Halves HP of all Pokémon on the field.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

shadow-hold.name: Shadow Hold
shadow-hold.effect:
The target cannot switch out normally.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This effect ends when the user leaves the field.

The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell.

Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.

shadow-mist.name: Shadow Mist
shadow-mist.effect: Lowers the target's evasion by two stages.

shadow-shed.name: Shadow Shed
shadow-shed.effect: Removes the effects of light screen, reflect, and safeguard.

shadow-sky.name: Shadow Sky
shadow-sky.effect: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns.  Pokémon other than shadow Pokémon take 1/16 their max HP at the end of every turn.  This move is typeless for the purposes of weather ball.
